title: Re: Sarah (Levelass) pregnant and going to marry
content:
I don't recall ever having the confirmation email issue. It always seems to work for me. In the case of this forum, the most likely scenario is it's been marked as spam by the email service and sent to the junk/bulk/spam folder. Or blocked entirely, but I don't think the mainstream providers would do that.

Surely there must be a way for the admins to delete users and such. If not, after moving to a good forum service we can do a bunch of user trimming and get the lost names back.
